overview: Harmel S. Rayat is the President of Kalen Capital Corporation, a family office with diversified holdings in real estate, private and public companies, and natural resources throughout Canada and the United States. Mr. Rayat has more than 25 years of experience selecting and managing investments and, as senior principal, is responsible for asset allocation, portfolio diversification and manager selection; direct investments and company operations; commercial property management; tax and estate planning; and family philanthropy. Mr. Rayat has served as an officer and/or director of corporations involved in a variety of industries, such as information technology, oil and gas, alternative energy, medical devices, biotechnology, and commercial real estate and land development. Mr. Rayat resides in Vancouver, British Columbia.
